results.content:
Obviously way too old a version of Dreamweaver- The instructor was using Dreamweaver 3 while acknowledging that 5.5 was already out. The rest of the world is up to 6 now. I would have liked to see the FTP tutorial using the Dreamweaver FTP instead of yet another program.
The C-Panel looked a little dated but still a good basic explanation of the functions you might find. NOt bad- Just an old course.
results.content_html:
Obviously way too old a version of Dreamweaver- The instructor was using Dreamweaver 3 while acknowledging that 5.5 was already out. The rest of the world is up to 6 now. I would have liked to see the FTP tutorial using the Dreamweaver FTP instead of yet another program.
The C-Panel looked a little dated but still a good basic explanation of the functions you might find. NOt bad- Just an old course.

results.content: If you are interested in learning how to create html sites without learning html code this course is for you. Dreamweaver is great and builds all the html for you. Would recommend for people starting out with web.
results.content_html: If you are interested in learning how to create html sites without learning html code this course is for you. Dreamweaver is great and builds all the html for you. Would recommend for people starting out with web.

results.content: I coded a website in college and had to write all the code myself. After watching this video tutorial I am shocked at how easy it is to create a website with this software. You just create a page, format the page, insert your colors, images and text and you are ready to go. Dreamweaver makes create a website super easy.
results.content_html: I coded a website in college and had to write all the code myself. After watching this video tutorial I am shocked at how easy it is to create a website with this software. You just create a page, format the page, insert your colors, images and text and you are ready to go. Dreamweaver makes create a website super easy.

results.content: If you want to learn how to use Dreamweaver this is a great course. Shows you how to do the things that every web developer needs to know how to do. The course is organized well and instructor is straight forward with the tutorial. Great course if you need to learn Dreamweaver and FTP programs.
results.content_html: If you want to learn how to use Dreamweaver this is a great course. Shows you how to do the things that every web developer needs to know how to do. The course is organized well and instructor is straight forward with the tutorial. Great course if you need to learn Dreamweaver and FTP programs.

results.content: Course covers the more useful elements of Dreamweaver and shows you how to create a site and upload it to your hosting company. Instructor is very engaging and has a perfect voice for radio. Course was easy to follow and was very clear.
results.content_html: Course covers the more useful elements of Dreamweaver and shows you how to create a site and upload it to your hosting company. Instructor is very engaging and has a perfect voice for radio. Course was easy to follow and was very clear.

results.content: Clear and direct to the point. It is good to learn about what CPanel is and for some to learn about domain names and FTP programs.
results.content_html: Clear and direct to the point. It is good to learn about what CPanel is and for some to learn about domain names and FTP programs.

results.content: I have no supplementary materials.  And his split screen is different than mine on CC which has added an additional challenge.  I am learning some basics but I will probably need to take an additional more in-depth​ course to get the knowledge I am looking for on my CC version of Dreamweaver

results.content: This course simplifies the process of creating an html website with Dreamweaver. Even if you don't want to create an html page yourself these tips are great just for learning how to edit a page.

results.content: Good for beginners.  I learned quite a bit too!

results.content: The course goes more into CPanel than Dreamweaver.
